Comments_List: Improved my existing documentary film making abilities in terms of both technical skill and storytelling artistry.

More collaboration with other departments would help. The class gives ample guidance for technical aspects and artistry but not much for how to collaborate and seek out support which is vital to documentary filmmaking. I believe the course should try to encourage collaboration with students learning other aspects of filmmaking, finding ways the project needs of one course could meet the class requirements of another.
I would recomend this course to any student with an interest in documentary filmmaking.
